{{Description|There will never be enough heat. Never.}}
'''Pyronado''' is [[Xiangling]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|snapshot|Pyronado DMG|character=Xiangling|snapshottime=at the third swing during casting}}
* {{TalentNote|icd|Swing DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|icd|Pyronado DMG|0}}
* Assuming Talent level 1: Xiangling will do 3 Pyro "swing" hits in a small area around her at the start of the skill (72% + 88% + 110% = 270%) damage, before summoning the actual Pyronado which deals 112% each orbit. If Xiangling's 4th constellation is not unlocked, the Pyronado will hit enemies 7-8 times (a small amount of anticlockwise movement is needed to get the 8th hit in before the Pyronado vanishes).
** At Talent level 1, this totals 1166% damage: 72% + 88% + 110% + (112% × 8)

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Deepfry}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Slowbake}} Pyronado's total duration is 14 seconds.
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Condensed Pyronado}} While the buff is also granted to Xiangling, it does not affect Xiangling's casted Pyronado.
